description: This file defines the main page component for a note-taking web application. It manages state for notes, user authentication, search, filtering, and note editing functions, and renders child components such as Header, Sidebar, NoteCard, and NoteEditor.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom hook to fetch and manage notes data, including loading and error states.

methods.name: NotesPage
methods.description: Main functional component rendering the notes interface, handling note creation, editing, filtering, and user authentication flow.

methods.name: handleCreateNew
methods.description: Creates a new note with default title and adds it to state.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves the currently drafted note, updating existing or creating new based on selection.

methods.name: toggleTag
methods.description: Toggles tag selection for filtering notes.
